Entry.JapaneseText: トーマ
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイラ
Entry.EnglishText: Nayla

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: おばあさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: モクラド村
Entry.EnglishText: Mocrado Village

Entry.JapaneseText: モクラド村
Entry.EnglishText: Mocrado Village

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイラの家
Entry.EnglishText: Nayla's House

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: ここがモクラド村か……？
Entry.EnglishText: Is this Mocrado Village?

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな人里はなれたところに、 村があったなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: It's hard to believe that people would live in a place as remote as this.

Entry.JapaneseText: わざわざこんなヘンピな所に 住まなくてもいいのにネ？
Entry.EnglishText: Why on earth would they build a village out in the middle of nowhere?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……何か事情があるのだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: ...There's probably a reason for it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺たちは、 招かれざる客かもしれん。 気をつけて行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: Stay sharp. Our presence might be considered unwanted.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Cyan>死の使い<White>のカード……
Entry.EnglishText: The <Cyan>Death Card<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうした？
Entry.EnglishText: Is something up?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何でもないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Not at all.

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪いけど何も言わないで……
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry, but I don't want to talk right now.

Entry.JapaneseText: でもよ……
Entry.EnglishText: But...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ほっといて……
Entry.EnglishText: Leave me alone.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……無理をするなよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Don't let it get to you...

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋で待ってるぞ……
Entry.EnglishText: We'll be waiting for you at the inn.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Hilda>さん……
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>...

Entry.JapaneseText: もう一度、 お母さんと話をしてみない？ やっと会えたのに、このままじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps you should try talking to your mother one more time. You can't just leave it at that when you were finally reunited...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……何を話せっていうの？
Entry.EnglishText: ...You have some nerve.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの人は、私を……ハーフの子供を 見たくもないって言ったのよ！ あんただって聞いたでしょう？
Entry.EnglishText: That woman, she... She said she didn't even want to look at meー at her own childー because I'm a Half! Or did you somehow not manage to hear that?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、様子がおかしかった…… 何か理由があるのかもしれないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: But something was off about her. She must have some reason for saying that.

Entry.JapaneseText: 理由なんて 聞かなくたって……！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't give a damn about whatever reason she might have!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Hilda>さんは、 お母さんと話をしたくないの？
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... Are you sure you don't want to talk to your mother?

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたに何がわかるっていうの？ 大事に、大事に…… 両親に育てられたあんたに……
Entry.EnglishText: What would you know about something like that? You were raised by parents who loved you...

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたは……怖いのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: You're scared.

Entry.JapaneseText: 怖い……？ 私が？
Entry.EnglishText: Me? Scared?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうよ、あなたは怖がってるわ。 でも、何がそんなに怖いっていうの？
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, you're scared of something. But what are you so scared of?

Entry.JapaneseText: お母さんへの憎しみが本物に変わる事？ お母さんに会いたかった自分を認める事!? それが今までの自分を否定する事になるから？
Entry.EnglishText: That your hatred towards your mother may have been justified? Acknowledging the fact that you wanted to meet your mother? Afraid that all of this denies who you are?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……痛い？ 私も痛いわ。 でも、この痛みが教えてくれた。
Entry.EnglishText: Did that hurt? I'm hurt as well. But this pain has taught me something.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたが持ってる、 お母さんへの強い想い…… そして、不安を……
Entry.EnglishText: It let me know of your intense feelings you have towards your mother... And of your uncertainty...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……痛みを恐れていては、 自分が本当に欲しいものなんて 手に入らないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you keep being afraid of pain, then you'll never obtain what you truly desire.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたなら…… 望まない身体を持つあんたなら、 わかってくれると思ったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: You, of all people... I thought that after having been in a body you never asked for, you would understand...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……私は、こんな身体になってから、 今までよりもずっと、自分というものを 強く感じるようになった……
Entry.EnglishText: Ever since I've been placed in this body, my sense of self has only grown stronger.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鏡を見ても、 そこにあるのは他人の姿。 でも、私は<Red>私<White>を感じるの。
Entry.EnglishText: When I look in the mirror, I see a stranger staring back at me. But I am still aware of who <Red>I<White> am.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私の塊みたいな何かがあって、 それが身体の真ん中に入ってて……
Entry.EnglishText: Whatever it is that makes me <Italic>me</Italic> is tucked away deep within my body.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、どんな姿をしていても、 私は私のままなの……
Entry.EnglishText: So I know that no matter what's on the outside, I'll always be me.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さんが<Hilda>さんなのは、 心とか考え方が<Hilda>さんだから じゃないのかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: Aren't your heart and your mind what make you "<Hilda>"?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ごめんなさい、 偉そうな事言って……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry... I didn't mean to come off as patronizing.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたって、 不思議な子ね。
Entry.EnglishText: You're a strange girl, you know that?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……みんなのところに 戻りましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go meet up with the others.

Entry.JapaneseText: 申し訳ありません。 馬車は運休となっております。
Entry.EnglishText: We're truly sorry, but Carriages are not available for use at the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>お金が足りないようですね。 馬車のご利用料金は <nmb:12C>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>You seem to be short of money. The fee for using the carriage is <nmb:12C> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>馬車をご利用になりますか？ 料金は定額で<nmb:12C>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>Would you like to use a carriage? The fare is a flat rate of <nmb:12C> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>馬車を利用しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Travel by Carriage? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマル
Entry.EnglishText: Anikamal

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬車に乗らない
Entry.EnglishText: Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエン
Entry.EnglishText: Kyogen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: モクラド
Entry.EnglishText: Mocrado

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>馬車で<unk18:48F00428B8048880>に移動します。 料金<nmb:12C>ガルド はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>To travel to <unk18:48F00428B8048880> by Carriage, it'll be <nmb:12C> Gald. Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ……！
Entry.EnglishText: The hell?!

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスだ!! かなり強いヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: It's a powerful Force!

Entry.JapaneseText: トーマ!! なぜここに!?
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma! What are you doing here?!

Entry.JapaneseText: この国は今、ジルバ様によって 救済されようとしている。
Entry.EnglishText: Under the leadership of Lady Zilva, this country's salvation will soon be at hand!

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、おまえたちが得ようとしている 聖獣の力は、その妨げとなるのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: However, the powers of the Sacred Beasts that you are obtaining would sabotage her efforts!

Entry.JapaneseText: 邪魔者を消しに来た、 というわけか。
Entry.EnglishText: So I take it you're here to stop us.

Entry.JapaneseText: ぬふふふ…… このみじめったらしい村は おまえらの墓場に良さそうだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Muhahaha... This miserable excuse for a village will make for a splendid graveyard.

Entry.JapaneseText: トーマ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 誰だ、おまえは？
Entry.EnglishText: Who the hell are you?

Entry.JapaneseText: 覚えていない……？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you not remember me...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 夫を殺し……娘を…… <Hilda>を奪っておいて、 よくもそんな事を……!!
Entry.EnglishText: You murdered my husband and stole my daughter <Hilda> away from me! How dare you forget such a thing!

Entry.JapaneseText: おぉ、あの時の女か。
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, you're that woman from before.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたが……父親を殺した？ 私を奪ったって……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Did you really... kill my father? And kidnap me?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は捨てられてたんじゃないの……？ まさか……それも……
Entry.EnglishText: Didn't you tell me that I was abandoned...? Don't tell me... that you also lied about that?

Entry.JapaneseText: ふははは…… どうだ、傑作だったろう。 親に捨てられた憐れなハーフの物語は。
Entry.EnglishText: Muhahaha... It was my magnum opus! The tale of a poor little half who was tossed aside by her parents!

Entry.JapaneseText: それとも、俺が本当の 父親だったとでもした方が 劇的で面白かったか？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe I could have made the plot more dramatic by pretending to be your real father!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……トーマ……あんた……
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma... You...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 見ろ、ガジュマの身でありながら、 ヒューマの男の子供など産むから、 その娘はろくでもない女になった。
Entry.EnglishText: Behold, this is what happens when you bear the child of a Huma despite being a Gajuma. Your daughter will never amount to anything!

Entry.JapaneseText: 娘を侮辱する事は許さない!!
Entry.EnglishText: I will not allow you to insult my daughter any further!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん、許さなかったらどうする？ 無力なおまえには、 大事な娘すら守れまい。
Entry.EnglishText: And just what are you going to do about it? You think that a weakling like yourself is going to be able to protect your precious little girl?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>、危ない!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>, watch out!

Entry.JapaneseText: きゃぁぁぁぁぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaaahhh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイラさん!!
Entry.EnglishText: Nayla!!

Entry.JapaneseText: これで……いいの…… よかった……よかった……
Entry.EnglishText: It's... It's better this way... Thank goodness... Thank goodness...

Entry.JapaneseText: しっかりしてください!!
Entry.EnglishText: Hang in there, Nayla!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>……これ……
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... Take these...

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたのタロット…… 破っちゃったから…… 私のじゃ……イヤかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: I destroyed your Tarot Cards, so... You might not want mine, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Thank you...

Entry.JapaneseText: 出て行けなんて言って、ごめんね…… 今まで苦しめて……ごめんね……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry for telling you to go away... I'm sorry that you've had to suffer... for so long...

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイラさん!!
Entry.EnglishText: Nayla!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイラさん!!
Entry.EnglishText: Nayla!!

Entry.JapaneseText: バカな女だ。 ……いや、バカな夫婦だ。
Entry.EnglishText: What a foolish woman. Actually, both your parents were fools.

Entry.JapaneseText: 二人して娘をかばって 命を捨てるとはな……
Entry.EnglishText: They just had to go and throw their lives away trying to protect their daughter.

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、お父さんも 私のために……？
Entry.EnglishText: Wait... My father also laid down his life for my sake...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ふはは…… 困ったなぁ、<Hilda>よ。
Entry.EnglishText: Muhahaha... Quite the conundrum isn't it, <Hilda>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分を捨てたと思って 憎んできた親が、本当は おまえを……ぬあッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: How does it feel to know that the parents you thought had abandoned you, the parents you had come to hate, had actuallyー Guahh?!

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なんだ今のは……!? 攻撃が見えなかったぞ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: W-what just happened...?! I couldn't even perceive that attack?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐおぉぉぉぉぉぉッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Gwaaaaahh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 許さない…… あんたは絶対に許さない!!
Entry.EnglishText: You'll pay for this... I'll make you pay!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><Hilda>を含む パーティ編成にしてください。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Form a party that includes <Hilda>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐあぁぁぁぁぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Guaahhh...

Entry.JapaneseText: このトーマが…… おまえらごときに…… やられて……たまるかぁっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Like hell... I'm going to be beaten... by the likes of you...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたは絶対に許さないって…… 言ったでしょうッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I said I would make you pay... Didn't I?!

Entry.JapaneseText: こ、こ、これは!!
Entry.EnglishText: W-w-what is this?!

Entry.JapaneseText: や……やめろぉ、やめてくれ!! た、助けてくれぇぇ……
Entry.EnglishText: S-stop... Stop it! S-someone help me...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>、大丈夫か？
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>, are you all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……さっさと起きなさいよ。 目を開けてこっちを見なさいよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: ...Wake up this instant. Open your eyes so you can look at me!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さん…… お母さんは……
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... Your mother is...

Entry.JapaneseText: 冗談じゃない…… 冗談じゃないわよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: This isn't the time for games... Quit messing around!

Entry.JapaneseText: 聞きたい事があるのに…… あんたに言いたい事があるのに…… なんで死ぬのよ!! 勝手すぎるわよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I have so many things I want to ask you... So many things I want to tell you... How dare you die on me! How could you be so selfish!!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうして私を生んだの……？ 私は何のために生まれたの……？
Entry.EnglishText: Why did you give birth to me? Why was I born?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 答えて……母親でしょう!! お願い……答えて……答えてよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aren't you my mother?! Answer me! Please, answer me... Give me an answer!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は……私は何なの!!
Entry.EnglishText: Just... Just what am I?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: 待って、<Hilda>さん……
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, <Hilda>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイラさんの荷物を 整理してたら出て来たの。
Entry.EnglishText: I've found these while I was going through Nayla's belongings.

Entry.JapaneseText: 彼女が大切にしていた水晶、 手紙と一緒に持って行って あげて……
Entry.EnglishText: Take the letter, along with this crystal that your mother treasured dearly.

Entry.JapaneseText: それは、あなたが赤ちゃんの頃、 あなたのために手に入れたものだって、 お母さんが言ってたわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Your mother told me that crystal was something she acquired for your sake when you were just a baby.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私のために……？
Entry.EnglishText: For my sake?

Entry.JapaneseText: 詳しい事はわからないけど、 アルヴァン山脈のふもとにある島で、 あなたの長生きをお祈りしたって……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know the details, but apparently she went to an island at the foot of the Alvan Mountains to pray that you would have a long life.

Entry.JapaneseText: そのお祈りをするために、 この水晶が必要だったとか……
Entry.EnglishText: That crystal was needed in order to do that.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もしかしたら、 その水晶って、聖獣探しの 手がかりになるかも……！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, maybe that crystal is the key to finding the next Sacred Beast.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……色々とありがとう…… いつか、必ず戻って来ます。 お元気で……
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you for everything. I promise I will come back someday. Take care until then...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……お待たせ。
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry to keep you waiting.

Entry.JapaneseText: アルヴァン山脈のふもとの島と 言っていたな。
Entry.EnglishText: She mentioned an island at the foot of the Alvan Mountains, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ…… そこへ向かうわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: She did. Let's head over there.
